Amy I hope you are correct but taking it back is going to be a lot harder than we think--there have been so many illegals allowed in and so many welfare people until the working class is just about gone under--and depending who is elected in the next election is really going to count.

No jobs. Record high on food stamps. Insurance cancelled for millions. People dying because OBAMACARE does not cover medicine they need. Gas prices have zero to do with OBAMA.... Or least liberals use to say presidents have nothing to do with gas prices . The stock market? Sure great... Printing billions will do that... Ask the people in the unemployment and food stamp lines how impressed they are with the stock market. 2500$ loss to median income. Middle class disappearing. The rich getting richer and the poor getting poorer. Yes thanks OBAMA.

What an awesome thing to do. Cherish your mom because you only get one. It shows the kind of man you are. Saying thanks and God bless you shows that your mom raised you the right way. Humble and appreciative. God bless you and your family!
